0:
”Alexa, Turn ON Smart Bulb”
”Alexa, Turn OFF Smart Bulb”

skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Crompton SENZE products help you control home appliance.You can simply ask Alexa to turn on, turn off or dim the light.

You can simply ask Alexa to turn on, turn off or dim the light. 
There’s no need to go to the switch to adjust home light - just talk to Alexa on your Amazon Echo, Echo Dot, Amazon Tap or Echo Show. 
After connecting Alexa to your Crompton products in a few simple steps:
1. Download "Crompton SENZE" app in Android or iOS app store.
2. Register with a new account in "Crompton SENZE" app.
3. You need to have some Crompton devices in hand.
4. Configure these devices in “Crompton SENZE" app and change appropriate name for your devices which will be used in "Crompton SENZE" skills.
5. Download Amazon "Alexa" app from Android, iOS or Amazon app store.
6. Configure Echo or Echo Dot with "Alexa" app.
7. Search "Crompton SENZE" skill from the "Alexa" app skills category.
8. Follow the instructions on the page to complete linking.
9. Now all setup is finished. 

You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:
“Alexa, turn on kitchen light"
“Alexa, turn off kitchen light"
“Alexa, dim livingroom light"
“Alexa, brighten livingroom light"
“Alexa, set the livingroom light to 20 percent"
“Alexa, set bedroom light to Blue"

If you have any problem when you use this skill, you can contact us with email: iot.support@crompton.co.in
